subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: J. D. Drew singled home Carl Crawford from with two outs in the 14th inning for a 9-8 win over the Oakland Athletics after Jonathan Papelbon blew a four-run lead.
snippet: J. D. Drew singled home Carl Crawford from with two outs in the 14th inning for a 9-8 win over the Oakland Athletics after Jonathan Papelbon blew a four-run lead.
